elbInfos.description: The Classic Elastic Load Balancer to use in a deployment. Conflicts with `target_group_info` and `target_group_pair_info`.

targetGroupInfos.description: The (Application/Network Load Balancer) target group to use in a deployment. Conflicts with `elb_info` and `target_group_pair_info`.

targetGroupPairInfo.description: The (Application/Network Load Balancer) target group pair to use in a deployment. Conflicts with `elb_info` and `target_group_info`.
